meanings.definition: A plant that retains green leaves throughout the year.
meanings.sent1: The evergreen tree in our backyard provides shade all year round.
meanings.sent2: I love the smell of evergreen trees during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the evergreen as a hiding spot for its acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her love for nature was like an evergreen, always vibrant and full of life.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the majestic evergreen against the blue sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Remaining fresh, relevant, or popular over a long period of time.
meanings.sent1: The classic novel is considered an evergreen favorite by many readers.
meanings.sent2: His evergreen fashion sense never goes out of style.
meanings.sent3: The joke he told was so evergreen that it made everyone laugh for days.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like an evergreen bond, strong and enduring.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song was so evergreen that it stayed in my mind all day.
